resources.string:
Hi, my name is Brian. 

I love chicken. 

The kind that is alive full of energy running around in a big farm or a forest. 
Fun fact is that I have big farm and a mini forest. 

I like eating chicken too. Fried chicken. Baked chicken. Grilled chicken. Poached chicken-not so much. 
And sometimes I even go for wild chicken hunting. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Brazil, and very hungry, I even caught a big wild rooster with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to breed chicken. 
You should ask someone else about wild chicken hunting though.
